Other pages for this artwork cycle: 

=== PixOffice ===

PixOffice is a dark theme with turquoise highlights and features user-changeable colors.

=== Design ===

The PixOffice theme is a balance between shades of grey and black resulting in a theme which is easy on the eyes in any lighting condition.

=== Desktop Preview ===

<nowiki>[[File:scr-PixOffice.png|Click image to zoom]]</nowiki>

=== Download ===

** Theme: <nowiki>[[attachment:GTK-PixOffice-0.3.tar.gz|PixOffice theme for GTK and Metacity]]</nowiki>

=== Installation ===

One method to install a Gnome theme is to open the "Appearance Preferences" dialogue under '''`System>Preferences`''' menu and click the <Install> button. Gnome will prompt you to select a theme which in this case is `PixOffice-0.1.tar.gz`. Once installed, select the ''PixOffice'' theme from the list of available themes.

=== Recommendations ===

The Mist icon theme fits into the PixOffice theme very well.
